name: Poached Shrimp With Thai Basil and Peanuts
description: This quick shrimp salad is garnished with roasted peanuts for crunch. You can serve it on crisp lettuce leaves for an impressive presentation, but cucumber rounds also make a fine conduit.
keywords: appetizer, dairy-free, gluten-free, low-fat, peanut, shrimp
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 teaspoon chopped Thai basil, or more as needed

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a small pot of salted water to a simmer. Add shrimp and cook gently until just opaque, about 2 minutes. Drain well; cool.
Toss cooled shrimp with vinegar, oil and basil. Toss in peanuts. Serve on top of cucumber rounds, garnished with more basil.
